attributes.action: The Queen to take control of parliment due to resignation of PM and inaction
attributes.additional_details: We are be prevented bt carrying out any  negotiations and it will start affecting our economy.
attributes.background: There was a referendum with regards to the EU. The result was clear to leave the EU. The PM has resigned. The EU require us to activate article 50 and keep stability in the UK and Europe. The Queen needs to fake back power of Parliment to activate Article 50 and ensure a new mire stable government
